info:
More than 30 years ago daxx found his passion in music. In 1996 he signed his first contracts with several labels and publishers. His productions spread across a huge genre and he released on worlds biggest labels under several aliases. With his roots in the Early Hardcore scene, he's always been an enthusiastic listener of Hardstyle. In 2000 he produced Early Hardstyle and had several releases. In the mid-2000's he focussed on House and Electro, Orchestral Music and Movie Scores.

www.ravebusters.com
